column3: Go to admin journal search page at /admin/journals
Locate a record with the metadata value 'Last full review: Never' and click 'Edit this journal'
Locate the "Last Full Review" section of the form
Enter a date in the future in "Last Full Review" field

column4: The date cannot be entered into the form field

column3: Enter a date today or in the past in the field

column4: The date can be entered into the form
The journal record is saved successfully

column3: close the journal form and go back to the admin search page
Order the results by "Last Full Review" with the most recent first

column4: The journal you just edited is displayed at the top of the results
The "Last Full Review" field displays the date you just entered
